entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:15 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
